display_long_description:
Experience the thrill of becoming a master renovator in the captivating Amazing Renovation: Episode 1! Help the owner of an old house transform it into a stunning masterpiece. Begin your journey by searching for lost items, exploring every corner of the house. Who knows, you might find something valuable that can be sold for a profit.

Once you have gathered everything you need, it's time to get to work. Armed with a hammer, demolish the old furniture to make way for new design solutions. Then, use a vacuum cleaner to clean up all the debris, creating a tidy and cozy space. Choose your favorite colors and paint the walls, ceiling, and floor, crafting the interior of your dreams.

The final stage is the most exciting! Use a tablet to select new furniture and decorations, arrange them to your liking, and enjoy the results of your hard work. The entire process is accompanied by humorous dialogues with the homeowner, adding extra charm and humor to the game.

Make this house unique and show what you can do! Amazing Renovation: Episode 1 is your chance to unleash your creativity and enjoy an unforgettable virtual renovation experience. Step into new challenges and possibilities!
